full_summary:
=================

#### Tender Announcement
=====================

### Project Description
-------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to supply, deliver, and offload one (1) new Multi-Purpose Utility Vehicle/Machine to Banff National Park, Banff, Alberta.

### Key Details
--------------

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3697604239
*   **Publication Date**: November 9, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2022, at 14:00 EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 26, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2023

### Additional Information
----------------------

*   **Trade Agreements**: The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   **Contracting Entity**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User Entity**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
*   **Contact Information**: Erin Kaiser (SPAC/PSPC), [erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Request for Proposal (RFP)
---------------------------

Interested contractors are invited to submit a proposal in response to this RFP. The proposal must include all required supporting documentation and bid submission. Bids submitted after 14:00 EST on the closing date will be declared non-responsive.

### Notes
------

Please note that there is an amendment to the initial tender closing time. Refer to the original RFP posting for more information.

**Resources**

*   [Tender Notice](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14594437?extsite=MTQ1OTQ0MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Bid Submission**
-----------------

Refer to the original RFP posting for detailed submission instructions and requirements. Ensure all required documents are submitted before the deadline to ensure full consideration. Only bids submitted on or before 14:00 EST on the closing date will be considered responsive.  Please contact the following if you have any further questions:

Erin Kaiser (SPAC/PSPC)  
**erin.kaiser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.  



Note: As the capacity is 400 words, we have summarized and given only key necessary information and details about the project.
